title: Rain Man
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father dies and leaves a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

title: Die Hard
description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: Cinema Paradiso
description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Akira
description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by his childhood friend.

title: Dangerous Liaisons
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

title: Mississippi Burning
description: Two F.B.I. Agents with widely different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: Big
description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

title: Midnight Run
description: A mob accountant is embezzling money, and a bounty hunter wants to bring him in.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Beetlejuice
description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Heathers
description: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

title: The Land Before Time
description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

title: The Accused
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A criminal attorney fights the system to prosecute the men who raped a young woman, as well as the onlookers who cheered them on.

title: Working Girl
description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss's job.

title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
description: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion changes their lives.

title: Running on Empty
description: The son of fugitives from the 1960s wants to go to college and live his own life, but he knows that if he does he may never see his parents again.

title: A Cry in the Dark
description: A mother whose child was killed by a dingo is wrongly accused of murder.

title: Stand and Deliver
description: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.

title: Gorillas in the Mist
description: The story of Dian Fossey, a scientist who came to Africa to study the vanishing mountain gorillas, and later fought to protect them.

title: Bull Durham
description: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

title: The Vanishing
description: Rex Hofman and Saskia Wagter are on holiday in France when Saskia suddenly disappears at a gas station. Rex devotes the next few years to finding her.

title: Dead Ringers
description: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

title: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
description: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
description: Two con men, one elegant and one slovenly, compete to swindle an American heiress out of $50,000.

title: Miracle Mile
description: A young man answers a pay phone outside a diner in Los Angeles and is told that nuclear missiles will hit the city in 70 minutes.

title: Eight Men Out
description: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

title: Child's Play
description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

title: Hairspray
description: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

title: Married to the Mob
description: An undercover FBI agent falls in love with a recently widowed mafia wife who is trying to start a new life away from the crime world.

title: The Accidental Tourist
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A travel writer for business travelers who hates travel writes about the difficulty of overcoming the tragic death of his son and the end of his marriage.

title: Bird
description: The troubled life and career of the jazz musician, Charlie "Bird" Parker.

title: Colors
description: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.

title: Mystic Pizza
description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

title: Talk Radio
description: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

title: High Hopes
description: A working-class couple in London, Cyril and Shirley, deal with their eccentric neighbors and aging mother.

title: Salaam Bombay!
description: The story of Krishna, a boy who is abandoned by his mother at a circus and must survive on the streets of Bombay among drug dealers, pimps, and prostitutes.

title: Time of the Gypsies
description: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Gypsy with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

title: Landscape in the Mist
description: Two children search for their father who is supposed to live in Germany. Their obsession for this father figure will take them to the boundaries between childhood and adolescence.

title: Alice
description: A surrealist re-imagining of Alice in Wonderland.

title: Little Dorrit
description: Arthur Clennam returns to London after working abroad for many years. He befriends a seamstress, Amy Dorrit, who lives in a debtors' prison with her father.

title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
description: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

title: Coming to America
description: An extremely pampered African prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife who he can respect for her intelligence and will.

title: Willow
description: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

title: Scrooged
description: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

title: The Thin Blue Line
description: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.

title: They Live
description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over Earth.

title: Ariel
description: A coal miner named Taisto Kasurinen attempts to leave behind a life of poverty, but ends up being framed for a crime he did not commit.

title: Damnation
description: Karrer, a depressed man in love with a married singer at the Titanic Bar, involves her husband in a smuggling scheme to get him out of the way.
